naive_bayes_classification module¶

Basic implementation of Naive Bayes Classification

Uses a combination of CoutVectorizer (i.e. Bag of Words) and TF-IDF for feature extractions

naive_bayes_classification.classify(labelled_files, unlabelled_files, labels)¶

Run the classification on the given text file.

Parameters

  • labelled_files (List) – The files labelled by the user (i.e. training set)

  • unlabelled_files (List) – The files to run classification on

  • labels (List) – The labels given for each file in labelled_files

Returns

  • (List) predicted_labels: The list of predicted labels

  • (List) probabilities: The list of probabilities representing

    certainty for predicted label
